title: Karbon Card raises Rs 55 crore debt finance from Northern Arc, UCIC and Oxyzo - Economic Times
content:
1. Karbon Card raises Rs 55 crore debt finance from Northern Arc, UCIC and Oxyzo  Economic Times
  2. Start-up Karbon Card raises Rs 55 cr debt finance from Northern Arc, others  Business Today
  3. Karbon Card raises â‚¹55 crore in debt financing round from Northern Arc, UCIC and Oxyzo  BusinessLine
  4. View Full coverage on Google News
description: UCIC, incubated by Unitus Capital, is an impact focussed non-banking financial company registered with Reserve Bank of India, while Oxyzo is the lending arm of OfBusiness and is backed by Softbank. Karbon said it would use the funds to empower and enable startups and SMBs with corporate credit cards that they can use as flexible growth capital.
